mapper.select: select NVL(count(*),0) from (select TO_DATE(borderdate,'YY/MM/DD') borderdate,bpaynum,bfinalmoney,delfee,bstatus,receiver,mnum from bpayment where mnum=#{mnum} and TO_CHAR(BORDERDATE,'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YY/MM/DD'),'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDay},'YY/MM/DD'),'YY/MM/DD') order by borderdate desc )bpayment, (select * from members)members where members.mnum=bpayment.mnum
select btype,bnum from paymentbook where bpaynum=#{bpaynum} and rownum=1
select count(*) from paymentbook where bpaynum=#{bpaynum}
select btitle from books where bnum=#{bnum}
select obname,obstatus from oldbooks where obnum=#{bnum}
